data.name: strAboutText1
data.value:
Idea by Daniel S. Programmed by Andreas L.
Many thanks ...
... to Daniel S. and Stefan E. for the ideas/program tests! ... to Elmo who made the dutch translation!

data.name: strAutoBackupDirectoryDoesNotExists
data.value: The directory does not exist at the moment! But as soon as a new backup is created, the directory will be created again!

data.name: strAutoSaveCouldRecoverThisFile
data.value: AutoSave can restore the following file:

data.name: strAutoSaveDescription
data.value: AutoSave is a feature that always makes a backup at a predefined interval (e.g. every 5 minutes). In other words, if SimpleJournal terminates unexpectedly, you can save the document from AutoSave and load it again.

data.name: strAutoSaveNoBackupFileFoundHint
data.value: (Make sure that the AutoSave interval is not too high!)

data.name: strBackupFileCannotBeOpened
data.value: This journal cannot be opened because it is a backup!

data.name: strBackupOriginExplanation
data.value: Backups that have an origin are restored to the location of origin, for all other backups you have to choose to which folder the files should be restored!

data.name: strChooseRubberForm
data.value: You can choose the shape of the rubber

data.name: strChooseRubberSize
data.value: You can choose the size of the rubber

data.name: strDiscardQuestion
data.value: Are you really sure you want to discard this file?

data.name: strDiscardQuestionAll
data.value: Are you really sure you want to discard all files?

data.name: strDisplayRecoverDialogDescription
data.value: If AutoSave is activated and SimpleJournal will exit unexpectedly, it can happen that there are no files to restore (e.g. an empty document or if no changes were made after saving). The message can still be useful because you will be aware that SimpleJournal was terminated unexpectedly.

data.name: strDisplayRecoverDialogTitle
data.value: Display crash message even if there are no files to restore

data.name: strDisplaySidebarAutomaticallyDescription
data.value: The object bar always appears automatically when you select a shape or an image. However, this behavior can be annoying on smaller screens, where the object bar partially hides the paper.

data.name: strDontReplaceEllipsesWithCircles
data.value: Do not replace ellipses with circles

data.name: strEmptyClipboard
data.value: The clipboard is empty. There are no objects to insert!

data.name: strExportAsJournalExplanation
data.value: If this option is not selected, the pages are exported as images!

data.name: strExportDialogExpanderExplanation
data.value: Fold out all the pages or hide all the pages!

data.name: strFailedToCopyFile
data.value: Error copying the file! Please choose a different location!

data.name: strFailedToLoadJournalFromNetwork
data.value: Error while loading the journal, make sure that the journal is located locally on your computer. No journal can be loaded from the network!

data.name: strFailedToOpenAutoBackupDirectory
data.value: Error opening the directory in explorer:

data.name: strFailedToOpenNewSJInstance
data.value: Error while opening another instance of SimpleJournal:

data.name: strFailedToSendFeedback
data.value: Failed to send your feedback, please make sure you internet connection is working!

data.name: strFeedbackDescription
data.value: I would be very pleased to receive your feedback, regardless of whether you have a suggestion for improvement, an idea or a bug. You can help to significantly improve the quality of the program.

data.name: strFeedbackSent
data.value: Your feedback has been sent successfully. Thank you very much!

data.name: strFitToCurveDescription
data.value: Specifies whether Bézier smoothing should be used for rendering. After a curve is drawn, it is smoothed and no longer looks angular (often curves become very edgy, especially when drawing with the mouse, this setting is useful).

data.name: strHintInsert
data.value: Note: Please click anywhere on any page to insert the object there. Click on Yes to ignore this hint! Click on No to continue to receive this message!

data.name: strInsertPlotToolTip
data.value: Drag the coordinate system open by clicking on a point and then move the mouse/pen to the desired location and release

data.name: strInsertSimpleFormToolTip
data.value: Drag a shape by clicking a point once and then you can drag the shape with the mouse/pen

data.name: strJournalIsAlreadyOpened
data.value: This journal is already opened in another instance of SimpleJournal and therefore cannot be opened!

data.name: strJournalNeedsOnePageMinimum
data.value: There must be at least one page in the journal!

data.name: strManagePageTooltip
data.value: Allows you to manage the pages (e.g. change the order)

data.name: strNewerVersionAvailable
data.value: There is a newer version available:

data.name: strNoObjectsToDelete
data.value: There are no objects selected to delete!

data.name: strNoShapeRecognized
data.value: The selected area could not be recognized as a shape!

data.name: strPageManagmentButtonDecreaseZoom
data.value: Decreases the zoom factor of the preview

data.name: strPageManagmentButtonDeletePage
data.value: Clears or deletes the currently selected page, depending on the selection

data.name: strPageManagmentButtonIncreaseZoom
data.value: Increases the zoom factor of the preview

data.name: strPageManagmentButtonInsertBottom
data.value: Moves the currently selected page to the bottom

data.name: strPageManagmentButtonInsertPageAfterIndexBlanko
data.value: Inserts a blank page after the current page

data.name: strPageManagmentButtonInsertPageAfterIndexChequered
data.value: Inserts a chequered page after the current page

data.name: strPageManagmentButtonInsertPageAfterIndexRuled
data.value: Inserts a ruled page after the current page

data.name: strPageManagmentButtonInsertPageBeforeIndexBlanko
data.value: Inserts a blank page before the current page

data.name: strPageManagmentButtonInsertPageBeforeIndexChequered
data.value: Inserts a chequered page before the current page

data.name: strPageManagmentButtonInsertPageBeforeIndexRuled
data.value: Inserts a ruled page before the current page

data.name: strPageManagmentButtonInsertTop
data.value: Moves the currently selected page to the top

data.name: strPageManagmentButtonMovePageDown
data.value: Moves the currently selected page down one step

data.name: strPageManagmentButtonMovePageUp
data.value: Moves the currently selected page up one step

data.name: strPageManagmentToggleButtonBlanko
data.value: Changes the current page to the paper type: Blank

data.name: strPageManagmentToggleButtonChequered
data.value: Changes the current page to the paper size: Chequered

data.name: strPageManagmentToggleButtonRuled
data.value: Changes the current page to the paper size: Ruled

data.name: strPasteDescription
data.value: Just click on paste and choose a spot and click on it, then all copied objects will be inserted

data.name: strPatchFailedToOpenUrl
data.value: Error when opening the patch URL:

data.name: strPatchText
data.value: This version of SimpleJournal will not receive updates due to restructuring, so you should install this patch to continue receiving updates:

data.name: strPolygonToolTip
data.value: Draw a polygon by defining a starting point once (click). There you will get a circle, now you can add more edges, at the end an edge has to end at the starting point again to get a shape

data.name: strRecognizationDescription
data.value: Just draw a polygon/shape you want and it will be converted automatically to a polygon (just if your drawing is tidy)

data.name: strRulerDescription
data.value: Just click on a spot where you want to draw a line and then move the mouse to the target point. While moving you'll see how the stroke will be drawn

data.name: strSaveChanges
data.value: Do you want to save changes before closing the program?

data.name: strSelectDescription
data.value: You can select an area which you can edit

data.name: strSelectedDocumentNotExisting
data.value: The selected document no longer exists. Should it be removed from the list?

data.name: strSettingsActivateTouchButtons
data.value: Show touch buttons in the quick selection bar

data.name: strSettingsClearLastOpenedDocumentsToolTip
data.value: Clears the list of recently opened documents in the menu

data.name: strSettingsDisableTouchExplanation
data.value: Deactivates the touch screen on startup and reactivates it on exit. This option can be useful if you write with a pen, then you can put your hand on the display without your hand being recognized as input.

data.name: strSettingsDisableTouchscreenTitle
data.value: Disable Touchscreen (For advanced users)Disable Touchscreen (For advanced users)

data.name: strSettingsDisableTouchUWP1
data.value: SimpleJournal cannot differentiate between pen and finger input or there is no way to disable finger input completely.

data.name: strSettingsDisableTouchUWP2
data.value: However, there is the possibility to execute a Powershell script before starting and after closing SimpleJournal, which can be generated here!

data.name: strSettingsDisableTouchUWP3
data.value: To execute these scripts, 2 conditions must be met:

data.name: strSettingsDisableTouchUWP5
data.value: 2) You must allow Powershell to execute the script once (please enter and confirm the following command at Powershell)

data.name: strSettingsOpenSetupAssistantTooltip
data.value: Offers you the possibility to setup SimpleJournal again

data.name: strSettingsResetPensTooltip
data.value: Resets the pens to their original settings

data.name: strSettingsSetFileAssocToolTip
data.value: Sets this program as default for .Journal files

data.name: strSettingsTouchScreenExplanationNormal1
data.value: SimpleJournal cannot distinguish between pen and finger input respectively there is no possibility to disable finger input completely. Therefore, there is now an option to run a powershell script on starting/exiting SimpleJournal that disables/enables touch input system-wide.

data.name: strSettingsTouchScreenExplanationNormal2
data.value: In order for the Powershell script to execute you need to ensure the following steps:

data.name: strSettingsTouchScreenExplanationNormal4
data.value: 2) The Powershell script needs to be authorized (run the following command in Powershell and confirm it):

data.name: strSetupCompleted
data.value:
You have successfully completed the setup of SimpleJournal! Here I would like to give you a few more important hints that will help you to use SimpleJournal more effectively.
1. If you want to copy and paste something: Copying works as follows: When you have selected something click on "Copy". To paste something, just click on "Paste". However, nothing is pasted yet, as you can determine yourself on which page/position the object is to be pasted. Simply click on any position on any page.
2. If you want to export a document as a PDF, click on "Print" in the menu and select a PDF printer. Unfortunately, "Microsoft Print To PDF" does not work as desired, so it is recommended to install an alternative PDF printer! However, a journal can also be exported as a picture series!

data.name: strSetupDarkModeDescription
data.value: The dark mode currently only affects the menu band. The dialogs remain normal. The settings can all be changed later!

data.name: strSetupExitDialog
data.value: Are you sure you want to exit the setup wizard?

data.name: strSetupHDDescription
data.value: An HD resolution offers plenty of space for the elements of SimpleJournal, so you can still see the whole page. For small resolutions, for example, the sidebar will be is not displayed automatically and the scrollbar is enlarged.

data.name: strSetupInitalText
data.value: This assistant will help you to optimally set up SimpleJournal. There are some settings that are better suited for smaller or larger screens. These settings can be changed at any time in the settings dialog and the assistant can be called from there at any time too.

data.name: strSetupReplaceEllipsesWithCirclesDescription
data.value: Due to the accuracy of the shape recognition it can quickly happen that the drawn circle becomes an ellipse and you can prevent this with this setting.

data.name: strSetupRotationComparisonDescription
data.value: The rotation compensation ensures that your shapes are drawn straight, since the shape recognition is very accurate, oblique edges become e.g. an oblique rectangle and this can be corrected with this setting.

data.name: strSetupStep1
data.value: Step 1: Does your screen have an HD resolution?

data.name: strSetupStep3Description
data.value: The contact pressure refers to the pen you write with. The harder you press, the thicker you draw. This feature is often useful when you want to make a more significant stroke, and that's why this feature is enabled by default. But it can also be useful to disable this feature.

data.name: strSetupStep5Description
data.value: SimpleJournal's shape recognition allows you to easily draw circles, ellipses and shapes from polygons to hexagons. Your drawing is automatically converted to a shape when a shape is recognized.

data.name: strSetupStep6Description
data.value: You can customize the pens. SimpleJournal offers you 4 pens so that you can quickly switch between different colors/sizes. However, you can change the pens at any time at the top of the menu, i.e. if you do not yet know how to adjust your pens, you can simply click on "Next".

data.name: strSetupStep7Description
data.value: Here you can adjust your highlighter optimally for your needs. Here, too, you can change this setting very easily at any time at the top of the menu. If you do not yet know how the highlighter should be set, simply click on "Next".

data.name: strSetupTitle
data.value: Welcome to the SimpleJournal setup assistant!

data.name: strStrokesDescription
data.value: You can erase a whole stroke if you touch it

data.name: strTextNotFound
data.value: was not found, either the text does not exist, or you have to write more tidy!

data.name: strTextToHightlight
data.value: This is a text to be marked

data.name: strUnexceptedFailureLine1
data.value: SimpleJournal will now create a backup, please wait a moment. Afterwards the program will be closed!

data.name: strUnsupportedFormat
data.value: This format is currently not supported! Make sure you've a valid text/picture in your clipboard!

data.name: strUpdateDialogFailedToOpenBrowserAutomatically
data.value: Your browser could not be opened automatically: {0}. Please open your browser and enter the following URL: {1}. Alternatively you can easily download the latest version on {2}!

data.name: strUseBigScrollbarDescription
data.value: This setting is useful if you have a small screen, then you can use the pen to better reach the scroll bar.

data.name: strUseNaturalScrollingDescription
data.value: When scrolling by dragging/pushing, the natural scroll direction is used.

data.name: strUseOldChequeredPatternLine1
data.value: Use old pattern for checkered pages (For old documents)

data.name: strUseOldChequeredPatternLine2
data.value: Changing this setting not affect the currently loaded document.

data.name: strWantToClearPage
data.value: Do you really want to clear this page?

data.name: strWantToCreateNewJournal
data.value: Would you like to create a new journal without saving the old one?

data.name: strWantToDeletePage
data.value: Are you sure you want to delete this page?

data.name: strWatingText
data.value: Please wait while document "{0}" is loading ...

data.name: strWrongFileFormat
data.value: The specified file does not have the correct file format!

data.name: strSettings_DisableTouchscreenIfInForeground
data.value: Disable Windows touchscreen only when SimpleJournal is in the foreground

data.name: strSettings_DeactivateTouchScreenIfInForeground_Explanation
data.value: Disables the touchscreen when SimpleJournal is in the foreground, but also enables it when SimpleJournal is no longer in the foreground. This option is useful so that the touchscreen can still be used outside SimpleJournal, e.g. to scroll in PDF documents!

data.name: strPageManagmentButtonInsertPageBeforeIndexDotted
data.value: Inserts a dotted page before the current page

data.name: strPageManagmentButtonInsertPageAfterIndexDotted
data.value: Inserts a dotted page after the current page

data.name: strPageManagmentToggleButtonDotted
data.value: Changes the current page to the paper format: Dotted

data.name: strSettingsDialogTouchDeviceManagerDescription
data.value: Due to missing permissions, it is unfortunately not possible to automatically deactivate the touchscreen in this version. Therefore, the Touchscreen Device Manager is available for download here. With it you can deactivate the touch screen before working and activate it again afterwards (if this is necessary). The program works in the same way as the device manager and requires administrator rights!

data.name: strPDFConversationDialog_Explanation_Line1
data.value: To use a PDF document in SimpleJournal, it must first be converted to a journal document. This is done using Magick.NET in combination with

data.name: strPDFConversationDialog_Explanation_Line3
data.value: is installed, otherwise the conversion will not work!

data.name: strPDFConversationDialog_Hint
data.value: Attention: The original PDF document remains unchanged!

data.name: strPDFConversationDialog_GhostscriptMessage
data.value: An error occurred during conversion. Make sure that Ghostscript is installed!

data.name: strPDFConversationDialog_ButtonSearchToolTip
data.value: Select a path where the journal should be saved!

data.name: strFailedToExportJournalAsPDF
data.value: Error while exporting the journal as a PDF file

data.name: strPrintingError
data.value: A critical error has occurred while printing

data.name: strPDFCOnversationDialog_TooFewPagesMessage
data.value: The selected document has only {0} pages! Do you want to convert only pages {1} to {2} instead?

data.name: strSettings_OpenAutoSaveDirectory_ToolTip
data.value: Opens the directory containing the automatically created backups.

data.name: strSettings_OpenBackupDirectory_ToDo
data.value: Opens the directory containing the created backups (of old documents).

data.name: strPDFConversationDialog_UseOnlineConversation
data.value: Use Online Conversation (if your system is low on memory)

data.name: strMicrosoftPrintToPDFWarning
data.value: Microsoft Print To PDF doesn't work properly! It is not recommended to use the printer, do you want to use it anyway?

data.name: strPDFConversationDialog_Ticket_OnHold
data.value: Please wait until your ticket "{0}" is processed!

data.name: strPDFConversationDialog_Ticket_InQueue
data.value: Ticket "{0}" was added to the queue!

data.name: strUseRulerCompensation_Description
data.value: The ruler compensation ensures that lines that are drawn minimally crooked are automatically straightened.

data.name: strUpdateDownloadDialog_FailedToDownloadUpdate
data.value: An error occurred while downloading the update! Please try again later!

data.name: strSettingsSidebarTransparency_Description
data.value: Adds a slight transparency effect to the sidebar.

data.name: strSettingsUseBackstageMenu_Description
data.value: When activated, the menu is replaced by a more modern backstage menu.

data.name: strFailedToExtractSJFileAssoc
data.value: Failed to extract SJFileAssoc for creating the file association: {0}

data.name: strSetupSetp1_Description
data.value: Does your screen have HD resolution?

data.name: strPageManagmentDialog_HoverDefaultText
data.value: Hover the mouse over one of the buttons and the function is displayed here!

data.name: strPageManagmentDialogButtonRotatePage
data.value: Rotates the page (change from portrait to landscape or landscape to portrait)

data.name: strPageManagmentDialog_RotatePage_Message
data.value: Do you really want to rotate this page? If there is already drawing on the page, all drawings are moved!

data.name: strDotnetUpdateSetup_PrepareMessage
data.value:
The setup is started after the download and SimpleJournal is then closed (unsaved changes are lost)!
ATTENTION: SimpleJournal will not be restarted, please restart SimpleJournal after the .NET installation!

data.name: strDotnetUpdateSetup_FailedToDetermineDownloadUrl
data.value:
The download URL for .NET {0} could not be determined! The setup will be aborted.
Details: {1}

data.name: strNotifications_Update_MessageRun1
data.value: An update for SimpleJournal is now available:

data.name: strObsoleteNETVersionNotification_Message_Run1
data.value: You are using an outdated .NET version (

data.name: strObsoleteNETVersionNotification_Message_Run2
data.value: ). Please update your .NET version to ensure that the program works without errors.

data.name: strPatternDialog_HelpText_Description
data.value: In this dialog you have the option of optimally setting the various paper patterns ( chequered, dotted and ruled). The patterns are already very suitable for working with by default. However, it may be useful to adjust the patterns, e.g. a larger or smaller line spacing!

data.name: strPatternDialog_HelpText_Description_2
data.value: This dialog is intended to set the settings once ideally for your purposes. When you load other documents, your settings are not taken into account, i.e. you can load and edit other documents without any problems.

data.name: strPatternDialog_HelpText_Hint
data.value: The settings do not apply to current and loaded documents that have a changed setting or no setting. For example, if you load old documents, the default settings are used, otherwise the documents cannot be displayed cleanly.

data.name: strPatternDialog_HelpText_Hint2
data.value: This means that the settings you make here only apply to new documents. If you insert a new page, the settings from the currently loaded document are always used.

data.name: strPatternDialog_HelpText_Hint3
data.value: The settings made here always refer to the entire document!

data.name: strPatternDialog_HelpText_ResetSettings
data.value: The settings can be reset at any time, but please note that this does not apply to documents that have already been loaded.

data.name: strSettings_SkipOrientationMenu_Title
data.value: Automatically insert pages in portrait format

data.name: strSettings_SkipOrientationMenu_Description_1
data.value: If the document does not contain any pages in landscape format

data.name: strSettings_SkipOrientationMenu_Description_2
data.value: and this setting is activated, the menu is hidden when inserting a

data.name: strSettings_SkipOrientationMenu_Description_3
data.value: page and the page is inserted directly in portrait format instead!

data.name: strSettings_UseModernDialogs_Description
data.value: If activated, some dialogs that contain tabs are displayed in a modern way. The tabs are then in the title bar of the window and there is no longer a real title bar. The window can still be used normally!

data.name: strFailedToVerfiyHashMessage
data.value: The integrity check of the file failed, so the process was aborted. Please try again later and check your internet connection to avoid compromise!

data.name: strFailedToOpenReview
data.value:
An error occurred while opening the store.
To rate anyway, open the store and search for "SimpleJournal" and click on "How to rate SimpleJournal", specify the number of stars and then you can click on "Write review" on the right!

data.name: strReviewNotification_Message
data.value: I would be very happy about constructive criticism, suggestions and ideas!

data.name: strPDFConversationDialog_InvalidRange
data.value: Please enter a valid page range!

data.name: strFailedToConvertPDFDokument
data.value: Error while converting the PDF document: {0}

data.name: strUseLinkNavigationPDF_Description
data.value:
A journal generated from a PDF document containing over 100 pages consists of multiple journals (due to performance). With this setting buttons are displayed at the beginning and at the end of each document to navigate to the previous linked document or to the last linked document.
This setting is only relevant for larger documents!

data.name: strAskForUnsavedChanges
data.value:
Your journal has unsaved changes. Do you want to save the changes and load the selected journal (=YES)?
Click on NO to discard the changes and load the selected journal or click on Cancel to end the process.

data.name: strAskForUnsavedChanges_NewJournal
data.value:
Your journal has unsaved changes. Do you want to save the changes and create a new journal (=YES)?
Click on NO to discard the changes and create a new journal or click on Cancel to end the process.

data.name: strFeedback_Privacy
data.value: Your data will not be shared with third parties, but will only be used to reply to you! Further information can be found in the

data.name: strJournalLoadError_IncompatibleVersion
data.value: This journal was created with an older version of SimpleJournal that is no longer supported. Please open the document using SimpleJournal 0.4.9.1 or contact support@code-a-software.net for assistance with recovery!

data.name: strJournalLoadError_InvalidOrCorruptFile
data.value: This journal cannot be loaded because it is invalid or corrupted.

data.name: strJournalLoadError_UnsupportedVersionOrCorrupt
data.value: Unsupported or corrupted document format. Maybe this journal was created with an older version of SimpleJournal!
